briefTitle: Comparison of the Efficacy, Safety, and Pharmacokinetics of Sugammadex (MK-8616; Org 25969) in Elderly Participants With Adult Participants (MK-8616-029)
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Parallel Group, Comparative, Phase IIIa Trial to Compare the Efficacy, Safety, and Pharmacokinetics of Org 25969 in Elderly Subjects With Adult Subjects
summary: The purpose of the study is to compare the effectiveness, safety and pharmacokinetics of sugammadex in participants 65 and over with participants under 65. There is no hypothesis defined for the study.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Time From Start of Administration of Sugammadex to Recovery of the T4/T1 Ratio to 0.9
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: up to 10 minutes from start of sugammadex
